bio: I love the point where software intersects with people and makes life better. So, I partner with the world's greatest Tech companies from start-up to Fortune 100 to help them find the best possible HR and Finance & Accounting talent. Temple University BA, Human Resources Temple University Japan Study Abroad Apex K.K. Consultant, Professional Services Specialized Group Human Resources Manager Metropolis KK Operations Manager (Atomjobs.com) Daijob.com Sales Team Leader Credit Union of New Jersey TSR Division Manager
